values:
I'm so very aware that I look absolutely terrible in this picture. . . BUT. . . I'm soooooo happy!!! That silly boy of mine right there is absolutely everything to me. He's hands down the most important thing in my life.

So it's been awhile. . .

hmmm.... well me and Christina have our constant ups and downs.. hopefully things will even out sooner or later.

i'm in quite the little money predicament.. i don't seem to have enough for everything i want lol.

I need a car. Not happening anytime soon. I want to dye my hair.. possibly happening tomorrow.. who knows for sure?? dunno. I want a kitten.. dunno bout that either.. lol i'm such a spoiled brat.. i just want everything!!!!

Awwhhh but i'm really happy.. besides all that stuff.. i mean just loving that boy makes me happy enough. he makes me forget all the bad stuff.. i love him.

I Love You!!!!!!! <3<3<3

okay i never said that what i said was nice. but i said it because at the time you deserved it.

you have made me feel worse in the last few weeks then anyone has ever made me feel in my life. i haven't said a word about any of it either. i've just buried it all inside. i just hid it all. 

i feel like trying to fix things with you is wasted time because you don't want to fix everything you just want to yell and scream and tell me how it's all my fucking fault. well what the fuck do you fucking want from me?!?! because seriously i don't know!! 

do you want to see me break down and cry and say how i hate that naomi is ur new fucking best friend and how i just fucking lost one of the only people in my life that used to be there for me. but your not there now. ur never fucking there.. not lately.. 

i don't know what the hell you expect from me...

okay. i just don't.

i can't live up to anyone's expectations. i know this okay. i know! i know i'm just a big fuck up that can't make anyone happy. you have no idea how much fucking pain i have in me right now.

everything just hurts so fucking bad right now. it's all just slipping away and i can't catch a god damn thing.

let me tell you the only time in the day that i feel complete. the only time i am happy and i feel like maybe, just maybe i am worth it and i can make someone happy is when i'm with richard. he's honestly one of the only people that i wake up for every morning. i go to school and put forth effort and try to stay motivated so that i can see him. because he's the only person that makes me happy like that.

and to be honest danielle makes me happy too. and i don't care if you don't like her. because it doesn't matter what you think of her. you don't know her at all. and i don't care if you feel jealous of my friendship with her or if you don't like it. i dont' care. because at least at the end of the day when i call her up crying and tell her that everything is going wrong and i don't know what to do. she does out of her way to help me and to do anything and everything she can to make it better. 

you used to be there like that. i guess now ur just too busy.

so don't sit here and tell me its all my fault.. yes i've made my mistakes in all of this but you damn sure made yours too. and don't tell me that you wouldn't have said what i said tonight.. b/c the truth is you would say it, i feel positive you would. the only difference is you wouldn't have said it to me.. you would have said it to someone else. and i just am not like that. i say it to you. not to a messenger. i hate sneaky underhanded games. i don't play them. just like i don't get too close to people and make others uncomfortable.. .. oh well

i give up. i tried to say sorry to you. and you didn't want to hear it.. but you really owe me an appology too. b/c you fucked up too. only difference is i'm willing to admit i fucked up and you aren't. 

so if you want to be friends fine. we'll fix this and move on with it behind us.

if not... i need my sweat pants back i'll have your cd for you and i'd like you to just drop it at that.

the choice is yours. i don't care right now, because if i think about this anymore i'm gonna end up losing it and cutting myself and i know i'm stronger than that if i just try to be.

so w/e bye.

I'm sitting here really hoping right now that as I lay down to sleep tonight, that i can finally rest easy. I just want to end all of this worry and stress and be able to be happy through and through. I mean I'm happy now just along with worry.

So tonight I washed Hilary with Richard then went and ate some food with him and su padre. Then we went and got Nick and went to petsmart to get the birdseed for su padre and then nick bought the plexy (spelling?) glass for hilary's trunk. and then we went to the library too to drop off movies and this wierd place where rich got this license plate something or other... idk?

then we went to poop's but he wasn't there yet so i called dani and she was at taco bell so i had them take me up there and oh guess what!! finnigan bought me Emmit D'Arcy!! lol a lawn gnome!! it was exciting..

i don't know then went back to poop's ppl were there.. then came home..

I know he loves me and I love that way he can look at me and tell me so and make me feel it inside me so much that i just want to cry.. and usually i do... all the way up to my apartment... =/

i'm emotional... =/

getting hair dyed tomorrow and hopefully doing a lot of make up work..

I just have to come and say that I just don't understand anything I guess...

I mean for starters why are girls the way they are. Guys always try to make it sound so easy and say things like why can't you ALL just be friends.. but really it's harder than that. Because with girls you have a "best friend" and you feel threatened by other girls. It's almost like a dating relationship but not, ya know? it's fucking ridiculous that's what it is.

So I am not the type of person to hide things. I feel like my "best friend" is leaving me. I feel like she's found someone else who's just a better friend to her than I could be. And if that's how it is fine, I mean there's not much for me to do about it... it hurts though.

It hurts because it's just more proof to me that I can't live up to the needs of anyone... I try but one way or another... and sooner or later.. I fail... oh well... =/

But it's funny that just as she begins to slip away from me and I feel like I've lost my "best friend" then Danielle comes back into my life. I love that girl so much! I've always loved her! I think it's because we both know that we are the same person with minor differences. We can relate to one another on a different level and we are more comfortable around each other than with anyone else. I absolutely love that.

I just wish there was a way to be happy. . .

Losing my "best friend" does not make me at all happy.. I don't play well being second best for anyone. I won't even lie... I get bitter and jealous and mean. I do NOT enjoy being anyone's second best.

Having one of my very dearest friends back in my life though does make me happy.

And having Richard makes me the happiest. Because I don't have to worry about this sort of shit with him. For him I have unconditional love. Love that does nothing but grow. I love him and through all of this he really is the most important thing to me.

Don't get me wrong I love all of my friends and they are all important to me.. but no one is as important to me as he is. I just hope he gets to be there with me till the end... that would truly make my life complete.....

oh well.. this night is just going blahhhh to me right now.

i'm off to sleep.

 

enjoy sweet slumber with a lack of the bitterness consuming your heart....

So yesterday I got out of school at 12:55 and went to taco bell quickly with christina, josh, adam and bobby. then I went home and quickly changed my earrings and clothes and got cleaned up a little.

Then I went to OFH and picked up Nicky Poo and said hello to my baby that I love oh so much. Then headed out of there and to Starbucks where I picked up my one and only Marmot.......... FINNIGAN!!! LOL! ((danielle))

From there nicky poo was starving and complaining for food so we proceeded to enter the mall and he ate at the food court... which is something i wish i was doing at the current moment b/c i'm fucking starving i've not yet eating today.. oh well moving on.

We then saw christina, adam and naomi there for a few seconds. they left. we left.

Me and my finnigan decided she was gonna dye my hair for me so we went to Sally Beauty and picked out all of our equipment! lol!!

Then took nicky poo home and my mamii and i went back to my hizzy.

We chilled here for a bit and had about 86454641568215348 laughs..... including:

  • -"HEATHER!! IT HURTS!! IT HURTS!!"
  • -There's two of them!!! mwhahahah no one will ever know!!! hahahaha
  • awww those cute girls and how great of friends they have!!
  • packy's for smokey the purring lil feline!
  • ficky's for heather's boobages!!

Then we proceeded to McDonald's and chizzled while we wondered about all the damn cars in that mysterious parking lot where we deeply feel they may have been giving away free sex... i still believe they were!!!

Then Rich came and gotsted us and we went to his hizzy and you know what Finnigan and Shamus did????!!!!!

 

Jiggled on the Tramp!!!!! Hellllllll Yes'mmm!!

Then after all that jigglage and lots of laughs and ass rapings and ass grabbings lol and talking about going to vegas and getting illegally married in front of Rich's dad!! hahah! We finally did indeed have to temporarily depart! But it's only TEMPORARY Little Finnigan!! They shall never seperate the power of the Marmots again!!! hahahahaha OMG wait one more!!! AND ALL THE IRISHNESS IN HILARY!! AND SHE'S THE COLOR OF POT-O-GOLD!! AND ITS ALL LUCKY!!! heheheheheh!!!!

Oh well.. then my finnigan lefted me for a little time... and i spent the rest of my evening with my baby which is even better! Oh how very much I love him!!

We got lost mucho mucho times trying to get to where we needed to be.. I solved the mystery but he doesn't want to admit to that! LOL! i don't blame him though!

Then we went back homeward and had pizza with su padre and watched that crazy scifi movie with "The Children" and their orange crazy eyes!! omg! freaky stuff!!

Then baby took-ED me home and we had some quality goodbye time complete with hugs and kisses and cuddles and it made me MUCHO MUCHO happy!!!

Then I came homeward and talked with my marmii online and my baby too and some others as well but at the current moment those are the two that I miss the most!

Today was alright.. i guess?

I felt like shit so mom came and got me at 10:30 at school.

came home and slept from 11-2 then got up to wake up some before i go to work 4-8 then hopefully i'll get a call from my baby telling me that the track team is going out and he wants to come get me to go along.. because that afterall is the plan he spoke of yesterday!

lol!

Anyways...

found out that car i thought i was getting had a rotted frame underneath or something or another so that's a negatory mr. carwanter... oh well i'm upset but i'll get one..... eventually..

No matter though! B/C Finnigan surprisingly never got her license taken away! waaahhhhh hoooo!!

hmmmmmm lemme think... oh oh ..

i'm hoping things get better soon..b/c i don't want to have to take the adventurous ride with finnigan through the jungle to the place of sorrow and death...  that would be terrifying.. (none of you have any idea what i'm saying... it's not really bad but it is REALLY bad!)

Anyways.. i'm really hungry now so i think i'm gonna go snackage upon some delectable little treats! and then prepare myself for 4 hours of lovely lovely worktime then sit around and see if i get to see my babyyyy tonight!

 

have i mentioned that I love Richard with every ounce of me and that I never want to leave him! I love him MUCHO MUCHO!!!! ((and NO Jose did not teach me any spanish!! I ALREADY KNEW!!! LOL))

 

k well peace out playas!

(let's do this Finnigan style....)  k bye.

 

hehe!

I really have to admit that lately I just love this feeling I've had like I'm letting everyone else down and I'm just falling behind and I'm not good enough.

I have tried to please so many people that right now I feel like I've failed terribly and I can't please a single one.

I've been sitting here crying for 15 minutes straight now... I can't handle all of this pressure and stress. And the really fucked up part is almost all of it is being put on me by myself. I'm constantly trying to push myself to be everything everyone wants and needs me to be... But what am I really?

I don't even know.

I just feel so broken right now. Nothing I do is right. I can't fix anything. I'm just defective...

And I love you so much. I do. I love you so much. And if it weren't for all that love I would probably do something really stupid right now.

...sigh.

I don't know. I just don't know anything.

I'm such a ridiculous person. I really am. I don't know what causes people to care about me because the way I treat people sometimes... I don't even deserve it. I feel like I am undeserving of everyone in my life. I have these wonderful amazing people in my life and I really don't deserve any of it. Not any of it.

I just feel like things are building up inside of me.. and it's not even any big things.. just all little tiny things that I never even noticed before. I want to be able to say what is wrong... but I DON'T EVEN KNOW! I don't know. I'm just sure that I feel things building. And ya know maybe after this 30 minutes of crying something inside me will click and I'll feel better. I really hope so. Because all I want right now is someone to hold me.. and tell me that everything is fine. Really everything is fine. School is fine. Home is fine. I'm fine.

I don't know. I just need that right now.

I'm happy though.. really I am. If you take away all this stress and worry.. I'm happy.

I'm getting a car friday.

My Danielle, my dearest friend, my fellow marmoteer, she's living with padre again! I can see her all the time now! I miss her so very much and am very glad that we've made it through all the bad times and the rumors and we've come out of everything still loving each other. I care about her so very much! She understands everything and I never want to lose her.

I don't really know what else I have to say right now. I should probably go work on missing work so I don't fail school.

no...

I'm going to go finish crying and wash my face and put on a big fucking fake smile and go to work like I'm not stressed to hell right now and like I'm not worried that the rest of my existence is fucked. Because everything is fine.

Everything IS fine.

I am feeling so much worry, stress, confusion, and just overall exhaustion right now. I'm worried about my friends. I'm stressed about school. I'm confused about the possibility of having to just give up and let go of my friend. I mean I just can't deal with this anymore really I can't.

Then there is this whole school thing... gosh.. it's terrible really. That week I spent at home sick kind of dug me a hole that I haven't been able to get out of yet. I really need to focus on things. That's exactly what I need to do.

I feel really bad for the way I treat people sometimes. Right now it is all branching off of another worry I have. I don't really want to talk about it. But gosh.....

Everything will be okay. I just have to continue telling myself that. Everything is going to be just fine.

Other than that....

I'm in love with Richard. I have said this countless times before. But wow! He really just takes my breath away. I care about him more than anyone else in this world, and I really mean that. I never want to lose him or do anything to hurt him. I love him. I love him so very very much.

 

okay... well.. i'm just gonna go.. i feel like my brain is about to spontaneously combust...

"You're more than a lover
There could never be another
To make me feel the way you do
Oh we just get closer
I fall in love all over
Everytime I look at you
And I don't know where I'd be
Without you here with me
Life with you makes perfect sense
You're my best friend
You're my best friend. . ."

((Tim McGraw))

So yesterday was me and richard's two month anniversary! Our baseball game got post-poned which sucks.. but when we get to go to the rescheduled game we're gonna be 5 rows from the third baseline.. we are RIGHT there!! lol!

Today I didn't get to go to school b/c Adam sort of overslept and never came to get me... oh well.

Oh well...

So I don't know what there really is to say anymore. I'm in love with Richard and things are good with us... Christina is the best friend I've ever had... again... lol! I'm not sure why we ever stopped talking but I'm glad she's all mine! lol!

Something I've come to realize lately though is that in life a lot of people you cared for you don't get to keep. Sometimes you have to let people go and accept the fact that you just can't keep them around forever. That's what I've been trying to do... I don't know though... people are just difficult.

I don't know... I want to write.. that's what I want to do.. I mean really write. The kind of writing where I can pour out my soul and when I'm done feel more at peace than ever before. So I'm gonna go work on that.

try to write later....

Baby I've been drifting away
Dreaming all day
Of holidng you
Touching you
The only thing I want to do
Is be with you
As close to you
As I can be

Let's make love
All night long
Until all our strength is gone
Hold on tight
Just let go
I want to feel you in my soul
Until the sun comes up
Let's make love
Oh, baby

Do you know what you do to me
Everything inside of me
Is wanting you
And needing you
I'm so in love with you
Look in my eyes
Let's get lost tonight
In each other

Let's make love
All night long
Until all our strength is gone
Hold on tight
Just let go
I want to feel you in my soul
Until the sun comes up
Let's make love

Let's make love
All night long
Until all our strength is gone
Hold on tight
Just let go
I want to feel you in my soul
Until the sun comes up
Oh, until the sun comes up
Let's make love

Oh baby, let's make love
All night long
All night long
Let's make love

((Faith Hill & Tim McGraw))

 

So lately things have been good... I don't know there's not much to say right now..

I have a headache.. I'll write later..

so time has been going by so fast it seems.
school will soon be over. summer soon here.

richard has mono. i had to stay home from school today to go to the doctors to get a blood test to see if i have it as well.

i've been sleeping all day like crazy.

i don't really got much to say today.. i don't know.

i miss him.

so as of lately.. hmm..

my freakin celly broke so i have the replacement AGAIN... :( and i don't have A LOT of my numbers i have a few of em.. but most are in the cell that will not turn on. so yeah i hate it. but i'm actually dealing really well.

let's see.

friday i worked 4-11 then richard picked me up so we could meet with boo boo and kev and george and poop and nick and poops brother and yeah go cosmic bowling. it wasn't very cosmic at that place.. lol oh well.

then sat. baby came over at and we went to my family's easter thing and then to the IX with stina and kev then to eat and stuff...

oh yeah skipped thursday when me and baby hung out and stuff.

today i went to richard's for easter then came home. then took my lil sis to the movies.


life has been good for me lately. i've got some stuff bothering me everynow and again but i'm so happy and so in love and i have so many wonderful people that love me. i'm thankful.


oh poo and i think i'm starting to get sick.. =(

oh well.. bye till next time.

Today is my baby's birthday!!

Soooooo.... Happy Birthday Richard!!! I love you!

so yesterday was St. Patty's day. I stayed home and slept and made the decision that i wanted to drop my honors english class and go into regular... but divis refuses to let me... grrr!

so for the past like 2 hours i've been trying to catch up on reading the great gatsby which i'm all caught up with now!! and wow it's actually a really good book! =)

i still have to do my 20 notecards and 4 sourcecards and make a thesis for the paper that'll be due on wed. i haven't started any of that...

i have this checking project for personal finance to do and 3 precalc worksheets... =( i've really been letting myself fall behind.... not good.


tomorrow i unfortunately have to open.. but at like 5 i get to go with richard to babysit alana at his sisters till like 1 in the morning and this girl is the cutest baby in the entire world so that should be a blast. lol

ummmm... i dunno.. i dunno what to say really.

i mean lately i've been overwhelmed. i've been stressed and lazy..

i need to use this weekend as time to catch myself up on everything.
then i need to focus.


i keep having this urge to do something that i haven't done in at least 5 months... i'm really hoping my good judgement gets the best of me and i don't do it... i'll be so disappointed in myself. =(

oh well.. i'm off to continue working and wait for my phone call from my baby when he gets off work! i love him! and i love my best friend too!!!!! =)

soooooo....

let's see. 


Frodo... Kunta's relative fishy died a few days ago.. I think their whole family chain was just doomed. oh well.. 

so saturday i went to courtney's birthday party. i think i def. love south park! that's like what we did for like a few hours was watch it! woot woot fun stuff! and eat great food! mmmm!

then at like 945 i went and got richard from work he met my mommy when me and her met up to make the car exchange. then me and rich went and picked up boo boo and we went to meet kevin and some other of kev and rich's friends up at the bowling alley and we went cosmic bowling.... fun stuff.

then boo slept at my house i had to open sunday morning.

i worked sunday then ran to my aunt's house in strongsville with boo then ate at taco bell... can't believe i lost that damn sauce packet we may never see another one like that again. i'm upset =( 

then came home for like an hour or so then went to richard's! and i got to play with alana! cuz she's the most adorable 1 year old ever!


hmm then today got to sleep in as i will for the rest of the week. YAY!

hehe..



okay well luv ya! <3

i love love love him!!! 


<3


"Only bitches talk shit!" ((what u gon' do))

so lately i've not updated.. hmm...

well let's see. i've been working alot and saving money too!! woot woot! hopefully i'll save enough to have a car soon... god that'd be so great!

hmm what else. . .

i love my best friend! she is the best! she is my foot i am her hand!! tee hee!!! lol!

I Love Richard! That makes me the happiest! Everytime he says he loves me it makes me SO happy!! I can't wait to find the right time for him to meet my dad and mom and all that. Then he can start coming over here. He really makes me very happy! :)

hmm i gave blood today. that was a great experience. i really love knowing that my blood could now save someone's life. that is truly beautiful.

hmmm well i got the next two days off work... umm get to go to courtney's bday partay saturday!! wooooooohoooo! and i can't wait till next week and my getting to sleep in alllllllll week!! thank god adam is an awesome kid who will totally drive me to school all week! lol.

anyways.. i'm sleepy so i'm off to bed now.
night night!

<3

p.s. i almost forgot!! i got two new fishies! Naomi (named after my one and only!) and Frodo (Kunta's lost relative)!!! they are beautiful!

I love him and he loves me and that makes me SO happy!

hmmm i've been really busy lately.. nothing to say really.
if you need to know what's been going on then you prolly already do.

i haven't updated in awhile... i dunno i've been busy.

umm all i have to say is lately everyone has been annoying me endlessly.. not on purpose mind you just i've been irritable.. except for when i'm around winky he makes me happy and my boo boo makes me happy too! =) oh well i'm leaving.. bye

tonight was great!
i spent the night with winky booboo n marc
i'm soooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo glad he asked me out!
we have fun together! he's such a sweetie!
the only problem is this ex g/f and her obnoxious phone calls.... i really just hope he doesn't still have feelings for her... that would suck.
but if he did he wouldn't have asked me out.. so ok..


ahhhhhhh i'm so happy right now!

me n boo boo are taken!!! =)

<3

winky asked me out tonight i of course said yes!

booboo bought me din din tonight. fun stuff!

idk... i'm happy! and sleepy... so nite nite!

oh yeah and fuck all you who are out to ruin everyone's happiness! fuck you!

tonight was an alright night...
it has however become a death cab for cutie night.. it's all i wanna listen to even though it's making me terribly sleepy and sad and nostalgic... :( 
i can't help it i love it anyways...

Death Cab for Cutie Lyrics

A Lack of Color

And when i see you
I really see you upside down
But my brain knows better
It picks you up and turns you around
Turns you around, turns you around

If you feel discouraged
That there's a lack of color here
Please don't worry lover
It's really bursting at the seems
Absorbing everything
The spectrum's a to z

This is fact not fiction
For the first time in years
And all the girls in every girlie magazine 
Can't make me feel any less alone
I'm reaching for the phone

To call at 7:03 and on your machine I slur a plea for you to come home
But i know it's too late 
I should have given you a reason to stay
Given you a reason to stay [x3]

This is fact not fiction
For the first time in years



We Looked Like Giants

God bless the daylight, the sugary smell of springtime
Remembering when you were mine
In a still suburban town

When every thursday i'd break those mountain passes
And you'd skip your early classes
And we'd learn how our bodies worked.

God damn the black night with all it's foul temptation
I become what i always hated
When i was with you then

We looked like giants in the back of my grey subcompact
Fumbling to make contact
As the others slept inside

And together there
In a shroud of frost, the mountain air
Began to pass from every pane of weathered glass
And i held you closer than anyone would ever get

Do you remember the JAMC?
And reading aloud from magazines
I don't know about you but i swear on my name they could smell it on me
I've never been too good with secrets.
No...

And together there
In a shroud of frost and mountain air
Began to pass through every pane of weathered glass
And i held you closer...




Tiny Vessels

This is the moment that you know
That you told you loved her but you don't.
You touch her skin and then you think
That she is beautiful but she don't mean a thing to me.
Yeah, she is beautiful but she don't mean a thing to me.

I spent two weeks in Silverlake
The California sun cascading down my face
There was a girl with light brown streaks
And she was beautiful but she didn't mean a thing to me.
Yeah she was beautiful but she didn't mean a thing to me.

Wanted to believe in all the words that i was speaking
As we moved together in the dark
And all the friends that i was telling
And all the playful misspellings
And every bite i gave you left a mark

Tiny vessels oozed into your neck
And formed the bruises
That you said you didn't want to fade
But they did and so did i that day

All i see are dark grey clouds
In the distance moving closer with every hour
So when you ask "was something wrong?"
That i think "you're damn right there is but we can't talk about it now. 
No, we can't talk about it now."

So one last touch and then you'll go
And we'll pretend that it meant something so much more
But it was vile, and it was cheap
And you are beautiful but you don't mean a thing to me
Yeah you are beautiful but you don't mean a thing to me [x2]




Lightness

There's a tear in the fabric of your favorite dress
And i'm sneaking glances.
Looking for the patterns in static
They start to make sense the longer i'm at it.

Ivory lines lead
Oo wha-ho, oo wha-ho

Your heart is a river that flows from your chest
Through every organ
Your brain is the dam
And i am the fish who can't reach the cord.

Ivory lines lead
Oo wha-ho, oo wha-ho

Oh, instincts are misleading
You shouldn't think what you're feeling
They don't tell you what you know you should want.

Ivory lines lead
Oo wha-ho, oo wha-ho 
[x2]

Oh, instincts are misleading
You shouldn't think what you're feeling
They don't tell you want you know you should want.

Ivory lines lead
Oo wha-ho. 
[x2]




Transatlanticism

The atlantic was born today and i'll tell you how...
The clouds above opened up and let it out.

I was standing on the surface of a perforated sphere 
When the water filled every hole.
And thousands upon thousands made an ocean, 
Making islands where no island should go.
Oh no.

The distance is quite simply much too far for me to row
It seems farther than ever before
Oh no.

[instrumental break]

I need you so much closer [x4]
So come on, come on [x4]

i'm about to do the best i can to get all that i'm feeling out.

and if some of u read this and know exactly what it's about then i don't care because i just need to get it out.

okay.

i like him. i like him a lot. and sometimes i feel sure he feels something back cuz i'm sure there's something there or else he wouldn't say some of the things he says. right? anyways. i don't know. other times i think he's just scared really. i think he's scared that maybe if something was to happen and we decided to try anything.. not that there's talk of giving anything a try, although i wouldn't be against it... i think that he thinks that it would end up like other past experiences he's had. i remember that he said girls are usually fine with things for a month then are like no.. but i don't know. i'm not one to be like that. i'm really not. if we were to have something together then that's both of us saying hey we wanna try this. and it would be an effort on both parts. no one sided half stepping ya know what i mean? if you want something like that you have to be willing to put effort into it. and i know that i wouldn't be one of those people who after a month is like no it's done this is shitty or whatever. i understand that he has things going for him and seriously i think that is absolutely great. i mean these are things that are going to really get him places in life and wow really i hope he never lets anything stand in the way of any of that. seriously i hope nothing stops him. and i know that girls can be fussy and be like "blah blah blah you don't wanna spend time with me whine whine whine" but i don't know.. i'm an understanding person.. and i know that having other obligations doesn't mean there is no desire to see a person it just simply means that there are other obligations at the moment and you gotta sit back and chill and go do other stuff till ya know the time is better and you can spend time when time is there to be spent. i just really think that maybe people look too much into their pasts sometimes and it prevents them from having some of the things that their future could hold. i mean yes it's important to learn from mistakes, but don't let mistakes hold you back. i just wish i better understood what was going on. i know how i feel and i know how i am and i know what i'm thinking.. but i know nothing from the other side of things. 

what i do know is when i talk to you i'm happy, when i see you i'm happy and when your around i just wanna be close to you. and i mean i can't explain why... there's just something about you that strikes me in a really good way. there's just something in you that i like a lot. i'm not asking for anything because i'm just not one to be like that.

i'm not looking for forever... just a chance to see what may come.
i'm not asking to be anyones everything or anyones life... i just want to be something to someone and a small part of someones life.. i don't know.. i'm not a difficult girl to please..

okay well.. i said what i had to.. 
and wow.. it's really nice to have that off my mind a little bit.. i mean it's still rolling around in there.. but not completely as much.

i've been struggling to describe how i feel lately. i think this may be due to the fact that the past few days i've put on my happy face and left all the true emotions for my alone at home time. this is good because then i don't have to attempt to try to explain how i'm feeling or whats wrong to anyone (because usually no one really gets it) and its bad because then i start feeling conflicted inside.

but here it is.. all laid out as much as it can be.. as much as i'll allow it to be.....

i miss things. the way stuff was. the things that i used to have. back in the day everything in life was fun and simple. then people started drifting. things fell apart. i fell apart. that hurts.

other than that i miss you.

and other than that i miss feeling optimistic.. i haven't felt optimistic in 3 years. yeah that's pretty shitty stuff. i put myself down and tell myself it won't happen or i'm not good enough before i even give myself the chance to possibly succeed.

and now i'm all like yeah i feel this and i feel that and they are contradicting and i hope for this but i wish for that and i just want this and that and not to be like that anymore. i just want. and i need.

i don't know.

it's strange how the littlest things can affect you in the biggest way.

anyways.

i just know what i want and there's nothing i can do about it so i'm gonna just learn to deal.

i can't wait till march. i want to see all my bands. all these beautiful people and they're beautiful music that puts me at peace when i'm angry and cheers me up when i'm sad. all these songs that i can use to describe my emotions better than any words i could have come up with on my own.
god.. i love it i can't wait.

i miss writing. i used to write all the time. and i was good (not to be all full of myself but i mean i was). i miss it i can't seem to do it anymore.. i dunno..

blah.


i'm gonna go back to listening to hawthorne heights because they are fitting my mood best tonight.

"you are the song i know."

so i'm in the little hour break i've got here in the middle of this suck suck double shift.

the first shift was shitty. i think the second will be better though b/c smegie boo boo and rachel are there. so it be cool yo.

i came home looking forward to talkin to someone.. but nope. did not happen. oh well. 

im just gonna go back to listenin to my underoath while i relax for 30 more minutes...

xoxo
heather

Yeah I don't know I've had some time to think and reflect and you know what...
everything IS okay.

So yeah the truth is though I'm really not that type.. to like go out looking for some ass just ain't how I am. If it happens it happens, but I ain't gonna go chasing it down. And yes it's a fact of life sooner or later everyone's horny. Sex happens.

But I'm really not looking to rush into anything at the moment. Which I find it funny that one day goes by of me being alone and I'm getting offers like hey wanna do something or hey I'll leave my girlfriend for you! hah! What a self esteem boost. But no, seriously. When I do decide to get involved with someone I want something real. No lies, no secret motives... I just wanna love someone (and not like serious serious love love) just like A LOT. And if I'm not feeling it then it won't happen, but if I am I'm gonna work at things and it'll all be good.

Me just want some happiness!

Ummmm yeah me and Bee Bee's birfday... 6 more days!!! YAY! PLEASE SOMEONE ANYONE MAKE SURE YOU WISH ME A HAPPY BIRFDAY BECAUSE I DO NOT NEED TO FEEL UNLOVED!! IT HURTS ALOT!

... bye

my feelings on pain are like this...

physical pain you experience then it's over and you forget the exact intensity of it all. but emotional pain you carry. you carry it everywhere always in your heart. and sooner or later your heart is going to get so weighed down with pain that you won't be able to move anymore.
so..

give me the physical pain. that i can take. it comes it goes it scars it heals its done. instead of using your words or lack of them why can't you just punch me in the stomach for awhile. make me bleed a little. i can take that. but to sit there and verbally put me down night after night and make me feel so completely inadequate... that hurts me too much to even comprehend.

i just wish i could avoid the emotional pain and stick with the physical. i wish i was one of those people who didn't bury so many of their emotions. i wish i could be perfect for you. meet your every need. be exactly who you all want me to be. but i really just can't. and i'm not. i've spent so much time trying to make everyone else happy that most of the time i just forget about my own happiness. i wish i just had someone to talk to that understood everything that i'd like to talk about.

i need to call danielle soon. that would help i think.

i need to know how you feel. and i need to know what you want. and what you aren't telling me and what you need.... i need to know so much. and i don't.
i don't have control of anything.

i wish i did though.... 

i don't know.. i'm done now i guess.
